nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA AND CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA AND CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 9:00 PM CST Sun Nov 17
 the center of Sara was located near 18.1, -90.7
 with movement WNW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Sara (AT4/AL192024)
